name: Avarisk
description:
~About~

Created in 48 hours  for Ludum Dare 40!

Theme - "The more you have, the worse it is"

Grab as much loot as you can as you climb the tower, but be warned; each coin will limit your jumps, and speed up the ever-rising spike floor...

~Controls~

Left/Right - Move

Up - Jump

Down - Open doors/chests
